definition: (slang) Something awesome is about to happen! (originally, in a Japanese space battleship anime, it meant "Danger! High energy up ahead!" — a warning to either prepare for battle or take evasive action)
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
(slang) come on, you can't deny it!/don't you think so?!/(melodramatic form of 有沒有|有没有)
to invade/(of a storm etc) to strike/to hit
(onom.) sound of singing, cheering etc/(phonetic)/(dialect) to chat
sentence-final particle, contraction of 了啊, indicating exclamation/particle placed after each item in a list of examples
(Internet slang for 然而[ran2 er2]) however
(final particle similar to 了[le5], indicating that sth is obvious)
oh (interjection indicating that one has just learned sth)
sentence-final particle that conveys informality, warmth, friendliness or intimacy/may also indicate that one is stating a fact that the other person is not aware of
trypophobia (abbr. for 密集恐懼症|密集恐惧症[mi4 ji2 kong3 ju4 zheng4])
editor or creator of online content (diminutive term, often used to refer to oneself: I, me, this writer)
